projectStatement: This project was my first foray into animating vector graphic scenes
projectChallenges: Mimicing nature proved to be a challenge every designer will face
projectSolutions: Learning natural rhythms and watching time-lapse photography videos of the elements in my scene such as rotating stars and swaying trees were the inspiration for my timing sequences in my video

projectStatement: This project focused on learning to create introductory scenes that catch the eye for motion animation
projectChallenges: Learning to use AdobeAfter effects to manipulate scenes
projectSolutions: I spent countless hours studying AfterEffects animation through online courses and watching youtube videos for inspiration and small project ideas.

projectStatement: The goal for this project was create a video detailing what my future design practice will look like including my values, aspirations and design tenets
projectChallenges: It was a challenge to create my own animations that hold visual attention and represent what I was trying to communicate
projectSolutions: I spent countless hours researching various animations and coming up a strategy for my own pieces
